chapters.title: Chapter 29:  The Last Knot
chapters.info:
Edarra,
      p. 628â€”Wise One of the
      Nader sept of the Shiande Aiel.  She has blue eyes and fair hair, and
      is not much older than Perrin.  She can channel, and
      is of moderately high strength.  She went with
      Perrin to seek out Masema.
